com.vogon101.game.lib.vogongame.platform

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vogon101.game.lib.vogongame.platform.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The main player class for the platform game.
    Will default to square, one colour quad to represent the player on the screen. This will be a 64x64 red quad. To overide this either extend the class or use the setTexture(String path), setColour(double r, double g, double b) and setSize(int w, int h)
    Variables to use for control (All protected)
    x - The x postion of the player
    y - The y postion of the player
    xSpeed - The x speed of the player
    ySpeed - The y speed of the player
    newFloor - True if the player is not on the base floor
    jump
    Author:
    Freddie Poser

      The player's render method
      Override to add custom rendering otherwise it will default to a square (size set by user (setSize(int w, int h)) or default 64x64 and colour red or set by user ((double r, double g, double b)) unless texture is set (Texture texture)

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(java.lang.String path)
                throws VogonGameException
        Load a new texture to use for rendering from PNG image
        Uses VogonTextureLoader which extends TextureLoader
        Parameters:
        path - - The path of the PNG image
        Throws:
        VogonGameException - - Thrown when the image can't be loaded

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(java.lang.String path,
              java.lang.String type)
                throws VogonGameException
        Load a new texture to use for rendering from PNG image
        Uses VogonTextureLoader which extends TextureLoader
        Parameters:
        path - - The path of the PNG image
        type - - The file extention/type of image ie PNG or JPG
        Throws:
        VogonGameException - - Thrown when the image can't be loaded
